rules_text:
[i](As this enters, insert it into one of your three programs. At your first main phase each turn, the next program runs all its Subroutines.)[/i]
This spell has flash if you control an attacking creature.
Whenever this Subroutine enters or runs, target creature you control gets +1/+1 and gains indestructible until end of turn.
